title: Is Nimbus just Helvetica Condensed?
content: just wodering if there is any difference between Nimbus and Helvetica? Or is Nimbus just a Helveticlone similar to Swiss?
author: kojo

comments.content:
As far as I know, Nimbus is just URW's name for their clone of Helvetica.   
   
But hey, it \*is\* free.
